title: Prompt Analysis Schema
description: Schema for prompt analysis data in Orchestrator Thought Partner Mode

interpreted_intent.description: The interpreted intent of the prompt

confidence_score.description: Confidence score for the interpretation (0.0 to 1.0)

emotional_tone.description: Detected emotional tone of the prompt

ambiguous_phrases.description: List of ambiguous phrases detected in the prompt

reflection_questions.description: Socratic-style questions generated based on the analysis

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the analysis was created

prompt_quality_score.description: Optional score indicating the quality of the prompt (1.0 = crystal clear)

prompt_variants.description: Optional suggested variants of the prompt for clarity

domain_context.description: Optional domain-specific context extracted from the prompt

key_terms.description: Domain-specific key terms identified in the prompt
